title: Plastic waste worldwide - statistics & facts | Statista
body: Learn about the global plastic waste problem, its causes, impacts, and solutions. Find out how much plastic is produced, used, and recycled worldwide, and how it affects the environment and human health. Explore the latest statistics on plastic waste generation, flow, management, and trade by region, application, and type.

User (2023-12-08): Skip to main content. I'd like to learn more about plastic waste worldwide, its impacts, and the current statistics on this topic.

- Here are some relevant statistics and insights on global plastic waste:
  - Plastic production worldwide in 2021 was 390.7 million metric tons.
  - In 2019, global plastic waste generation was 353.3 million metric tons.
  - Only 15% of plastic waste worldwide was collected for recycling in 2019.
  - The plastic waste management methods varied by region in 2019.
